alert.note: Alert for Graham (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:28AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Graham County through 500 AM CDT... At 428 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Hill City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bogue around 440 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
